name: Pazuuk's Patience
description:
Fed up with your existence, you have gathered your doomsday cult around the sacrificial pit to summon Pazuuk, the Destroyer of Worlds.

The ritual requires a specific order of sacrifices, as indicated on the summoning stones surrounding the pit. Unfortunately, your eager cultist friends will sacrifice anything they can get their hands on...

It is upon you to make sure that the ritual is performed correctly, so that Pazuuk can be summoned and end this world.

Click and hold the [Left Mouse Button] to drag cultists.

This game was made in 51 hours for the dreamhackjam (Apocalypse).

Made by Emmy and Thomas.

Music Credits:
